00027 typedef struct    _CRDT_NODE
00028 {
00029       UINT32      uiType;                 //the type of node
00030 
00031       CHAR16      *pString;         //string for the node if the node contains a string
00032 
00033       UINT32      uiFlags;          //various flags
00034 
00035       INT16       sPosX;                  //position of the node on the screen if the node is displaying stuff
00036       INT16       sPosY;
00037 
00038       INT16       sOldPosX;               //position of the node on the screen if the node is displaying stuff
00039       INT16       sOldPosY;
00040 
00041       INT16       sHeightOfString;        //The height of the displayed string
00042 
00043       BOOLEAN     fDelete;          //Delete this loop
00044 
00045       UINT32      uiLastTime; // The last time the node was udated
00046 
00047       UINT32      uiVideoSurfaceImage;
00048 
00049       struct _CRDT_NODE *pPrev;
00050       struct _CRDT_NODE *pNext;
00051 }     CRDT_NODE;

00369 UINT32      CreditScreenInit( void )
00370 {
00371       gfCreditsScreenEntry = TRUE;
00372       return( 1 );
00373 }

00375 
00376 
00377 UINT32      CreditScreenHandle( void )
00378 {
00379       StartFrameBufferRender();
00380 
00381       if( gfCreditsScreenEntry )
00382       {
00383             if( !EnterCreditsScreen() )
00384             {
00385                   gfCreditsScreenEntry = FALSE;
00386                   gfCreditsScreenExit = TRUE;
00387             }
00388             else
00389             {
00390                   gfCreditsScreenEntry = FALSE;
00391                   gfCreditsScreenExit = FALSE;
00392             }
00393             gubCreditScreenRenderFlags = CRDT_RENDER_ALL;
00394       }
00395 
00396       GetCreditScreenUserInput();
00397       
00398 
00399       HandleCreditScreen();
00400 
00401       // render buttons marked dirty      
00402 //    MarkButtonsDirty( );
00403 //    RenderButtons( ); 
00404 
00405       // render help
00406 //    RenderFastHelp( );
00407 //    RenderButtonsFastHelp( );
00408 
00409 
00410       ExecuteBaseDirtyRectQueue();
00411       EndFrameBufferRender();
00412 
00413 
00414       if( gfCreditsScreenExit )
00415       {
00416             ExitCreditScreen();
00417             gfCreditsScreenEntry = TRUE;
00418             gfCreditsScreenExit = FALSE;
00419       }
00420 
00421 
00422       return( guiCreditsExitScreen );
00423 }

00440 //eee
00441 BOOLEAN           EnterCreditsScreen()
00442 {
00443       UINT32 uiCnt;
00444   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00445 /*
00446 
00447       VSURFACE_DESC           vs_desc;
00448 
00449       vs_desc.fCreateFlags = VSURFACE_CREATE_FROMFILE | VSURFACE_SYSTEM_MEM_USAGE;
00450 
00451       strcpy(vs_desc.ImageFile, "INTERFACE\\Credits.sti");
00452 
00453       if( !AddVideoSurface( &vs_desc, &guiCreditBackGroundImage ) )
00454       { 
00455             return( FALSE );
00456       }
00457 */
00458       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, 0 );
00459       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00460 
00461       if (iResolution == 0)
00462       {
00463                   FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\Credits.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00464       }
00465       else if (iResolution == 1)
00466       {
00467             FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\Credits_800x600.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00468       }
00469       else if (iResolution == 2)
00470       {
00471             FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\Credits_1024x768.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00472       }
00473 
00474       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiCreditBackGroundImage ));
00475 
00476       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00477       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\Credit Faces.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00478       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiCreditFaces ));
00479 
00480 
00481 
00482       //Initialize the root credit node
00483       InitCreditNode( );
00484 
00485       guiCreditsExitScreen = CREDIT_SCREEN;
00486       gfCrdtHaveRenderedFirstFrameToSaveBuffer = FALSE;
00487 
00488       guiCreditScreenActiveFont = FONT12ARIAL;
00489       gubCreditScreenActiveColor = FONT_MCOLOR_DKWHITE;
00490       guiCreditScreenTitleFont = FONT14ARIAL;
00491       gubCreditScreenTitleColor = FONT_MCOLOR_RED;
00492 //    guiCreditScreenActiveDisplayFlags = LEFT_JUSTIFIED;
00493       guiCrdtNodeScrollSpeed = CRDT_NODE_DELAY_AMOUNT;
00494       gubCrdtJustification = CENTER_JUSTIFIED;
00495       guiCurrentCreditRecord = 0;
00496 
00497 //    guiCrdtTimeTillReadNextCredit = CRDT_DELAY_BN_SECTIONS;
00498 //    guiCrdtDelayBetweenCreditSection = CRDT_DELAY_BN_SECTIONS;
00499 //    guiCrdtDelayBetweenNodes = CRDT_DELAY_BN_NODES;
00500 
00501       guiCrdtLastTimeUpdatingNode = GetJA2Clock();
00502 
00503 
00504       guiGapBetweenCreditSections = CRDT_SPACE_BN_SECTIONS;
00505       guiGapBetweenCreditNodes = CRDT_SPACE_BN_NODES;
00506       guiGapTillReadNextCredit = CRDT_SPACE_BN_NODES;
00507 
00508 
00509       for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt < NUM_PEOPLE_IN_CREDITS; uiCnt++)
00510       {
00511             // Make a mouse region
00512             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gCrdtMouseRegions[uiCnt], gCreditFaces[uiCnt].sX, gCreditFaces[uiCnt].sY, (INT16)(gCreditFaces[uiCnt].sX + gCreditFaces[uiCnt].sWidth), (INT16)(gCreditFaces[uiCnt].sY + gCreditFaces[uiCnt].sHeight), MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL,
00513                                            CURSOR_WWW, SelectCreditFaceMovementRegionCallBack, SelectCreditFaceRegionCallBack );
00514 
00515             // Add region
00516             MSYS_AddRegion( &gCrdtMouseRegions[uiCnt] );
00517 
00518             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gCrdtMouseRegions[uiCnt], 0, uiCnt );
00519       }
00520 
00521 /*
00522       //open the credit text file
00523       ghFile = FileOpen( CRDT_NAME_OF_CREDIT_FILE, FILE_ACCESS_READ | FILE_OPEN_EXISTING, FALSE );
00524       if( !ghFile )
00525       { 
00526             return( FALSE );
00527       }
00528 */
00529 
00530       giCurrentlySelectedFace = -1;
00531       gfPauseCreditScreen = FALSE;
00532 
00533       InitCreditEyeBlinking();
00534 
00535 
00536       return( TRUE );
00537 }
00538 
00539 
00540 
00541 BOOLEAN           ExitCreditScreen()
00542 {
00543       UINT32      uiCnt;
00544 
00545 
00546       //Blit the background image
00547 //    DeleteVideoSurfaceFromIndex( guiCreditBackGroundImage );
00548       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiCreditBackGroundImage );
00549       
00550       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiCreditFaces );
00551 
00552 
00553       //ShutDown Credit link list
00554       ShutDownCreditList();
00555 
00556       for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt < NUM_PEOPLE_IN_CREDITS; uiCnt++)
00557       {
00558             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gCrdtMouseRegions[uiCnt] );
00559       }
00560 
00561 /*
00562       //close the text file
00563       FileClose( ghFile );
00564       ghFile = 0;
00565 */
00566 
00567       return( TRUE );
00568 }
00569 
00570 
00571 //hhh
00572 void              HandleCreditScreen()
00573 {
00574 //    UINT32      uiTime = GetJA2Clock();
00575 
00576       if( gubCreditScreenRenderFlags == CRDT_RENDER_ALL )
00577       {
00578             RenderCreditScreen();
00579             gubCreditScreenRenderFlags = CRDT_RENDER_NONE;
00580       }
00581 
00582 
00583       //Handle the Credit linked list
00584       HandleCreditNodes();
00585 
00586       //Handle the blinkng eyes
00587       HandleCreditEyeBlinking();
00588 
00589 
00590       //is it time to get a new node
00591       if( gCrdtLastAddedNode == NULL || ( CRDT_START_POS_Y - ( gCrdtLastAddedNode->sPosY + gCrdtLastAddedNode->sHeightOfString - 16 ) ) >= (INT16)guiGapTillReadNextCredit )
00592       {
00593             //if there are no more credits in the file
00594             if( !GetNextCreditFromTextFile() && gCrdtLastAddedNode == NULL )
00595             {
00596                   SetCreditsExitScreen( MAINMENU_SCREEN );
00597             }
00598       }
00599 
00600 
00601 
00602       RestoreExternBackgroundRect( CRDT_NAME_LOC_X, CRDT_NAME_LOC_Y, CRDT_NAME_LOC_WIDTH, (INT16)CRDT_NAME_LOC_HEIGHT );
00603 
00604       if( giCurrentlySelectedFace != -1 )
00605       {
00606             DrawTextToScreen( gzCreditNames[giCurrentlySelectedFace], CRDT_NAME_LOC_X, CRDT_NAME_LOC_Y, CRDT_NAME_LOC_WIDTH, CRDT_NAME_FONT, FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, 0, FALSE, INVALIDATE_TEXT | CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00607             DrawTextToScreen( gzCreditNameTitle[giCurrentlySelectedFace], CRDT_NAME_LOC_X, CRDT_NAME_TITLE_LOC_Y, CRDT_NAME_LOC_WIDTH, CRDT_NAME_FONT, FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, 0, FALSE, INVALIDATE_TEXT | CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00608             DrawTextToScreen( gzCreditNameFunny[giCurrentlySelectedFace], CRDT_NAME_LOC_X, CRDT_NAME_FUNNY_LOC_Y, CRDT_NAME_LOC_WIDTH, CRDT_NAME_FONT, FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, 0, FALSE, INVALIDATE_TEXT | CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00609       }
00610 }
00611 
00612 
00613 //rrr
00614 BOOLEAN           RenderCreditScreen()
00615 {
00616 
00617   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00618 
00619       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiCreditBackGroundImage );
00620   BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, 0, 0, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL);
00621 /*
00622       HVSURFACE hVSurface;
00623 
00624       GetVideoSurface( &hVSurface, guiCreditBackGroundImage );
00625       BltVideoSurfaceToVideoSurface( ghFrameBuffer, hVSurface, 0, 0, 0, 0, NULL );
00626 */
00627       if( !gfCrdtHaveRenderedFirstFrameToSaveBuffer )
00628       {
00629             gfCrdtHaveRenderedFirstFrameToSaveBuffer = TRUE;
00630 
00631             //blit everything to the save buffer ( cause the save buffer can bleed through )
00632             BlitBufferToBuffer(guiRENDERBUFFER, guiSAVEBUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00633 
00634             UnmarkButtonsDirty( );
00635       }
00636 
00637       InvalidateScreen( );
00638       return( TRUE );
00639 }
00640 
00641 
00642 void              GetCreditScreenUserInput()
00643 {
00644       InputAtom Event;
00645 
00646       while( DequeueEvent( &Event ) )
00647       {
00648             if( Event.usEvent == KEY_DOWN )
00649             {
00650                   switch( Event.usParam )
00651                   {
00652 
00653                         case ESC:
00654                               //Exit out of the screen
00655                               SetCreditsExitScreen( MAINMENU_SCREEN );
00656                               break;
00657 
00658 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00659                         case 'r':
00660                               gubCreditScreenRenderFlags = CRDT_RENDER_ALL;
00661                               break;
00662 
00663                         case 'i':
00664                               InvalidateRegion( 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00665                               break;
00666 
00667                         case UPARROW:
00668                               guiCrdtNodeScrollSpeed+=5;
00669                               break;
00670                         case DNARROW:
00671                               if( guiCrdtNodeScrollSpeed > 5 )
00672                                     guiCrdtNodeScrollSpeed-=5;
00673                               break;
00674 
00675                         case PAUSE:
00676                         case SPACE:
00677                               if( gfPauseCreditScreen )
00678                                     gfPauseCreditScreen = FALSE;
00679                               else
00680                                     gfPauseCreditScreen = TRUE;
00681                               break;
00682 #endif
00683                   }
00684             }
00685       }
00686 }
00687 
00688 void SetCreditsExitScreen( UINT32 uiScreenToGoTo )
00689 {
00690       gfCreditsScreenExit = TRUE;
00691 
00692       guiCreditsExitScreen = uiScreenToGoTo;
00693 }

00696 
00697 BOOLEAN     InitCreditNode( )
00698 {
00699       if( gCrdtRootNode != NULL )
00700             Assert( 0 );
00701 
00702       gCrdtRootNode = NULL;
00703 
00704       return( TRUE );
00705 }
00706 
00707 
00708 BOOLEAN ShutDownCreditList()
00709 {
00710       CRDT_NODE   *pNodeToDelete=NULL;
00711       CRDT_NODE   *pTemp=NULL;
00712 
00713       pNodeToDelete = gCrdtRootNode;
00714 
00715 
00716       while( pNodeToDelete!= NULL )
00717       {
00718             pTemp = pNodeToDelete;
00719 
00720             pNodeToDelete = pNodeToDelete->pNext;
00721 
00722             //Delete the current node
00723             DeleteNode( pTemp );
00724       }
00725 
00726       return( TRUE );
00727 }
00728 
00729 BOOLEAN     DeleteNode( CRDT_NODE   *pNodeToDelete )
00730 {
00731       CRDT_NODE   *pTempNode;
00732 
00733       pTempNode = pNodeToDelete;
00734 
00735       if( gCrdtLastAddedNode == pNodeToDelete )
00736       {
00737             gCrdtLastAddedNode = NULL;
00738       }
00739 
00740       //if its Not the first node
00741       if( pNodeToDelete->pPrev != NULL )
00742             pNodeToDelete->pPrev = pNodeToDelete->pNext;
00743       else
00744       {
00745             if( gCrdtRootNode->pNext != NULL )
00746             {
00747                   gCrdtRootNode = gCrdtRootNode->pNext;
00748                   gCrdtRootNode->pPrev = NULL;
00749             }
00750       }
00751 
00752       //if its the last node in the list
00753       if( pNodeToDelete->pNext == NULL && pNodeToDelete->pPrev != NULL )
00754             pNodeToDelete->pPrev->pNext = NULL;
00755 
00756       //iof the node that is being deleted is the first node
00757       if( pTempNode == gCrdtRootNode )
00758             gCrdtRootNode = NULL;
00759 
00760       //Free the string
00761       if( pTempNode->pString != NULL )
00762       {
00763             MemFree( pTempNode->pString );
00764             pTempNode->pString = NULL;
00765       }
00766 
00767 
00768       //if the node had something to display, delete a surface for it
00769       if( pTempNode->uiType == CRDT_NODE_DEFAULT )
00770       {
00771             DeleteVideoSurfaceFromIndex( pTempNode->uiVideoSurfaceImage );
00772             pTempNode->uiVideoSurfaceImage = 0;
00773       }
00774 
00775 
00776       //Free the node
00777       MemFree( pTempNode );
00778       pTempNode = NULL;
00779 
00780       return( TRUE );
00781 }
00782 
00783 
00784 //aaa
00785 BOOLEAN     AddCreditNode( UINT32 uiType, UINT32 uiFlags, STR16 pString )
00786 {
00787       CRDT_NODE   *pNodeToAdd=NULL;
00788       CRDT_NODE   *pTemp=NULL;
00789       UINT32      uiSizeOfString = ( wcslen( pString ) + 2 ) * 2;
00790       UINT32      uiFontToUse;
00791       UINT8       uiColorToUse;
00792 
00793       //if
00794       if( uiType == CRDT_NODE_NONE)
00795       {
00796             Assert( 0 );
00797             return( TRUE );
00798       }
00799 
00800       pNodeToAdd = (CRDT_NODE *) MemAlloc( sizeof( CRDT_NODE) );
00801       if( pNodeToAdd == NULL )
00802       {
00803             return( FALSE );
00804       }
00805       memset( pNodeToAdd, 0, sizeof( CRDT_NODE) );
00806 
00807 
00808       //Determine the font and the color to use
00809       if( uiFlags & CRDT_FLAG__TITLE )
00810       {
00811             uiFontToUse = guiCreditScreenTitleFont;
00812             uiColorToUse = gubCreditScreenTitleColor;
00813       }
00814 /*
00815       else if ( uiFlags & CRDT_FLAG__START_SECTION )
00816       {
00817             uiFontToUse = ;
00818             uiColorToUse = ;
00819       }
00820       else if ( uiFlags & CRDT_FLAG__END_SECTION )
00821       {
00822             uiFontToUse = ;
00823             uiColorToUse = ;
00824       }
00825 */
00826       else
00827       {
00828             uiFontToUse = guiCreditScreenActiveFont;
00829             uiColorToUse = gubCreditScreenActiveColor;
00830       }
00831 
00832       //
00833       // Set some default data
00834       // 
00835 
00836       //the type of the node
00837       pNodeToAdd->uiType = uiType;
00838 
00839       //any flags that are added
00840       pNodeToAdd->uiFlags = uiFlags;
00841 
00842       //the starting left position for the it
00843       pNodeToAdd->sPosX = CRDT_TEXT_START_LOC;
00844 
00845       //Allocate memory for the string
00846       pNodeToAdd->pString = (CHAR16 *) MemAlloc( uiSizeOfString );
00847       if( pNodeToAdd->pString == NULL )
00848             return( FALSE );
00849 
00850       //copy the string into the node
00851       wcscpy( pNodeToAdd->pString, pString );
00852 
00853       //Calculate the height of the string
00854       pNodeToAdd->sHeightOfString =       DisplayWrappedString( 0, 0, CRDT_WIDTH_OF_TEXT_AREA, 2, uiFontToUse, uiColorToUse, pNodeToAdd->pString, 0, FALSE, DONT_DISPLAY_TEXT ) + 1;
00855 
00856       //starting y position on the screen
00857       pNodeToAdd->sPosY = CRDT_START_POS_Y;
00858 
00859 //    pNodeToAdd->uiLastTime = GetJA2Clock();
00860 
00861       //if the node can have something to display, Create a surface for it
00862       if( pNodeToAdd->uiType == CRDT_NODE_DEFAULT )
00863       {
00864             VSURFACE_DESC           vs_desc;
00865 
00866             // Create a background video surface to blt the face onto
00867             vs_desc.fCreateFlags = VSURFACE_CREATE_DEFAULT | VSURFACE_SYSTEM_MEM_USAGE;
00868             vs_desc.usWidth = CRDT_WIDTH_OF_TEXT_AREA;
00869             vs_desc.usHeight = pNodeToAdd->sHeightOfString;
00870             vs_desc.ubBitDepth = 16;
00871 
00872             if( AddVideoSurface( &vs_desc, &pNodeToAdd->uiVideoSurfaceImage) == 0 )
00873             {
00874                   return( FALSE );
00875             }
00876 
00877             //Set transparency
00878             SetVideoSurfaceTransparency( pNodeToAdd->uiVideoSurfaceImage, 0 );
00879 
00880             //fill the surface with a transparent color
00881             ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea(pNodeToAdd->uiVideoSurfaceImage, 0, 0, CRDT_WIDTH_OF_TEXT_AREA, pNodeToAdd->sHeightOfString, 0 );
00882 
00883             //set the font dest buffer to be the surface
00884             SetFontDestBuffer( pNodeToAdd->uiVideoSurfaceImage, 0, 0, CRDT_WIDTH_OF_TEXT_AREA, pNodeToAdd->sHeightOfString, FALSE );
00885 
00886             //write the string onto the surface
00887             DisplayWrappedString( 0, 1, CRDT_WIDTH_OF_TEXT_AREA, 2, uiFontToUse, uiColorToUse, pNodeToAdd->pString, 0, FALSE, gubCrdtJustification );
00888 
00889             //reset the font dest buffer
00890             SetFontDestBuffer(FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE);
00891       }
00892 
00893 
00894 
00895 
00896       //
00897       // Insert the node into the list
00898       //
00899 
00900       //if its the first node to add
00901       if( gCrdtRootNode == NULL )
00902       {
00903             //make the new node the root node
00904             gCrdtRootNode = pNodeToAdd;
00905 
00906             gCrdtRootNode->pNext = NULL;
00907             gCrdtRootNode->pPrev = NULL;
00908       }
00909       else
00910       {
00911             pTemp = gCrdtRootNode;
00912 
00913             while( pTemp->pNext != NULL )
00914             {
00915                   pTemp = pTemp->pNext;
00916             }
00917 
00918             //Add the new node to the list
00919             pTemp->pNext = pNodeToAdd;
00920 
00921             //Assign the prev node
00922             pNodeToAdd->pPrev = pTemp;
00923       }
00924 
00925       gCrdtLastAddedNode = pNodeToAdd;
00926 
00927       return( TRUE );
00928 }
00929 
00930 
00931 void HandleCreditNodes()
00932 {
00933       UINT32      uiCurrentTime =GetJA2Clock();
00934       CRDT_NODE   *pCurrent=NULL;
00935       CRDT_NODE   *pTemp=NULL;
00936 
00937       if( gCrdtRootNode == NULL )
00938             return;
00939 
00940       //if the screen is paused, exit
00941       if( gfPauseCreditScreen )
00942             return;
00943 
00944 
00945       pCurrent = gCrdtRootNode;
00946 
00947       if( !( GetJA2Clock() - guiCrdtLastTimeUpdatingNode > guiCrdtNodeScrollSpeed ) )
00948             return;
00949 
00950       //loop through all the nodes
00951       while( pCurrent != NULL )
00952       {
00953             pTemp = pCurrent;
00954 
00955             pCurrent = pCurrent->pNext;
00956 
00957             //Handle the current node
00958             HandleCurrentCreditNode( pTemp );
00959 
00960             //if the node is to be deleted
00961             if( pTemp->fDelete )
00962             {
00963                   //delete the node
00964                   DeleteNode( pTemp );
00965             }
00966       }
00967 
00968 //    RestoreExternBackgroundRect( CRDT_TEXT_START_LOC, 0, CRDT_WIDTH_OF_TEXT_AREA, CRDT_LINE_NODE_DISAPPEARS_AT );
00969 
00970       guiCrdtLastTimeUpdatingNode = GetJA2Clock();
00971 }
00972 
00973 void HandleCurrentCreditNode( CRDT_NODE   *pCurrent )
00974 {
00975       //switch on the type of node
00976       switch( pCurrent->uiType )
00977       {
00978 //new codes:
00979             case CRDT_NODE_DEFAULT:
00980                   HandleNode_Default( pCurrent );
00981                   break;
00982 
00983             default:
00984                   Assert( 0 );
00985                   break;
00986       }
00987 }
00988 
00989 void HandleNode_Default( CRDT_NODE  *pCurrent )
00990 {
00991       UINT32      uiCurrentTime =GetJA2Clock();
00992 
00993       //if it is time to update the current node
00994 //    if( ( uiCurrentTime - pCurrent->uiLastTime ) > guiCrdtNodeScrollSpeed )
00995       {
00996             //Display the Current Node
00997             DisplayCreditNode( pCurrent );
00998 
00999             //Save the old position
01000             pCurrent->sOldPosX = pCurrent->sPosX;
01001             pCurrent->sOldPosY = pCurrent->sPosY;
01002 
01003             //Move the current node up
01004             pCurrent->sPosY -= CRDT_SCROLL_PIXEL_AMOUNT;
01005 
01006             //if the node is entirely off the screen
01007             if( ( pCurrent->sPosY + pCurrent->sHeightOfString ) < CRDT_LINE_NODE_DISAPPEARS_AT )
01008             {
01009                   //mark the node to be deleted this frame
01010                   pCurrent->fDelete = TRUE;
01011             }
01012 
01013             //Update the last time to be the current time
01014 //          pCurrent->uiLastTime = uiCurrentTime + ( uiCurrentTime - ( pCurrent->uiLastTime + guiCrdtNodeScrollSpeed ) );
01015 
01016 //          pCurrent->uiLastTime = ( uiCurrentTime - ( uiCurrentTime - pCurrent->uiLastTime - guiCrdtNodeScrollSpeed) );
01017 
01018             pCurrent->uiLastTime = GetJA2Clock();
01019       }
01020 }
01021 
01022 
01023 
01024 BOOLEAN DisplayCreditNode( CRDT_NODE      *pCurrent )
01025 {
01026       HVSURFACE hVSurface;
01027 
01028       //Currently, we have no need to display a node that doesnt have a string
01029       if( pCurrent->pString == NULL )
01030             return( FALSE );
01031 
01032 
01033       //if the node is new and we havent displayed it yet
01034       if( pCurrent->uiLastTime == 0 )
01035       {
01036 
01037       }
01038 
01039       //else we have to restore were the string was
01040       else
01041       {
01042             //
01043             //Restore the background before blitting the text back on
01044             //
01045 
01046             //if the surface is at the bottom of the screen
01047             if( pCurrent->sOldPosY + pCurrent->sHeightOfString > CRDT_START_POS_Y )
01048             {
01049                   // WANNE 2
01050                   INT16 sHeight = SCREEN_HEIGHT - pCurrent->sOldPosY;
01051                   //INT16     sHeight = 480 - pCurrent->sOldPosY;
01052                   RestoreExternBackgroundRect( pCurrent->sOldPosX, pCurrent->sOldPosY, CRDT_WIDTH_OF_TEXT_AREA, sHeight );
01053             }
01054             else if( pCurrent->sOldPosY > CRDT_LINE_NODE_DISAPPEARS_AT ) 
01055             {
01056                   RestoreExternBackgroundRect( pCurrent->sOldPosX, pCurrent->sOldPosY, CRDT_WIDTH_OF_TEXT_AREA, pCurrent->sHeightOfString );
01057             }
01058 
01059             //if the surface is at the top of the screen
01060             else
01061             {
01062                   INT16 sHeight = pCurrent->sOldPosY + pCurrent->sHeightOfString;
01063 
01064                   RestoreExternBackgroundRect( pCurrent->sOldPosX, CRDT_LINE_NODE_DISAPPEARS_AT, CRDT_WIDTH_OF_TEXT_AREA, sHeight );
01065             }
01066       }
01067 
01068       GetVideoSurface( &hVSurface, pCurrent->uiVideoSurfaceImage );
01069 
01070 
01071       BltVideoSurfaceToVideoSurface( ghFrameBuffer, hVSurface, 0, pCurrent->sPosX, pCurrent->sPosY, VS_BLT_CLIPPED | VS_BLT_USECOLORKEY, NULL );
01072       
01073       return( TRUE );
01074 }
01075 
01076 //return false from this function when there are no more items in the text file
01077 BOOLEAN     GetNextCreditFromTextFile()
01078 {
01079       BOOLEAN     fDone = FALSE;
01080       UINT32      uiStringWidth = 20;
01081       CHAR16      zOriginalString[512];
01082       CHAR16      zString[512];
01083       CHAR16      zCodes[512];
01084       STR16       pzNewCode=NULL;
01085       UINT32      uiCodeType = 0;
01086       UINT32      uiNodeType = 0;
01087       UINT32      uiStartLoc = 0;
01088       UINT32      uiFlags=0;
01089 
01090 
01091       switch(guiCurrentCreditRecord)
01092       {
01093             case 0:
01094                   wcscpy(zOriginalString, L"@T,C208,R134,D16,B40,S10,J1,};");
01095             break;
01096 
01097             case 1:
01098                   wcscpy(zOriginalString, L"@T,{;JA2: Whitehat Project Team");
01099             break;
01100 
01101             case 2:
01102                   wcscpy(zOriginalString, L"@};");
01103             break;
01104 
01105             case 3:
01106                   wcscpy(zOriginalString, L"@T,C163,{;Programming");
01107             break;
01108 
01109             case 4:
01110                   wcscpy(zOriginalString, L"Alex \"Digicrab\" Vostrov");
01111             break;
01112 
01113             case 5:
01114                   wcscpy(zOriginalString, L"Michal \"Joker\" Laskowski");
01115             break;
01116 
01117             case 6:
01118                   wcscpy(zOriginalString, L"@};Jackaians");
01119             break;
01120 
01121             case 7:
01122                   wcscpy(zOriginalString, L"@T,{;Project Organization");
01123             break;
01124 
01125             case 8:
01126                   wcscpy(zOriginalString, L"Shanga");
01127             break;
01128             
01129             case 9:
01130                   wcscpy(zOriginalString, L"@};Keith \"Mouse Master\" Scroggins");
01131             break;
01132 
01133             default:
01134                   //Get the current Credit record
01135                   uiStartLoc = CREDITS_LINESIZE * (guiCurrentCreditRecord-10);
01136                   if( !LoadEncryptedDataFromFile( CRDT_NAME_OF_CREDIT_FILE, zOriginalString, uiStartLoc, CREDITS_LINESIZE ) )
01137                   {
01138                         //there are no more credits
01139                         return( FALSE );
01140                   }
01141 
01142       }
01143 
01144       //Increment to the next crdit record
01145       guiCurrentCreditRecord++;
01146 
01147 
01148       //if there are no codes in the string
01149       if( zOriginalString[0] != CRDT_START_CODE )
01150       {
01151             //copy the string
01152             wcscpy( zString, zOriginalString );
01153             uiNodeType = CRDT_NODE_DEFAULT;
01154       }
01155       else
01156       {
01157             UINT32      uiSizeOfCodes = 0;
01158             UINT32      uiSizeOfSubCode = 0;
01159             STR16       pzEndCode = NULL;
01160             UINT32      uiDistanceIntoCodes = 0;
01161 
01162             //Retrive all the codes from the string
01163             pzEndCode = wcsstr( zOriginalString, CRDT_END_CODE );
01164 
01165 
01166             //Make a string for the codes
01167             wcscpy( zCodes, zOriginalString );
01168 
01169             //end the setence after the codes
01170             zCodes[ pzEndCode - zOriginalString + 1 ] = '\0';
01171 
01172             //Get the size of the codes
01173             uiSizeOfCodes = pzEndCode - zOriginalString + 1;
01174 
01175             //
01176             //check to see if there is a string, or just codes
01177             //
01178 
01179             //if the string is the same size as the codes
01180             if( wcslen( zOriginalString ) == uiSizeOfCodes )
01181             {
01182                   //there is no string, just codes
01183                   uiNodeType = CRDT_NODE_NONE;
01184             }
01185 
01186             //else there is a string aswell
01187             else
01188             {
01189                   //copy the main string
01190                   wcscpy( zString, &zOriginalString[ uiSizeOfCodes ] );
01191 
01192                   uiNodeType = CRDT_NODE_DEFAULT;
01193             }
01194 
01195             //get rid of the start code delimeter
01196             uiDistanceIntoCodes = 1;
01197 
01198             uiFlags = 0;
01199 
01200             //loop through the string of codes to get all the control codes out
01201             while( uiDistanceIntoCodes < uiSizeOfCodes )
01202             {
01203                   //Determine what kind of code it is, and handle it
01204                   uiFlags |= GetAndHandleCreditCodeFromCodeString( &zCodes[ uiDistanceIntoCodes ] );
01205 
01206                   //get the next code from the string of codes, returns NULL when done
01207                   pzNewCode = GetNextCreditCode( &zCodes[ uiDistanceIntoCodes ], &uiSizeOfSubCode );
01208 
01209                   //if we are done getting the sub codes
01210                   if( pzNewCode == NULL )
01211                   {
01212                         uiDistanceIntoCodes = uiSizeOfCodes;
01213                   }
01214                   else
01215                   {
01216                         //else increment by the size of the code
01217                         uiDistanceIntoCodes += uiSizeOfSubCode;
01218                   }
01219             }
01220       }
01221 
01222       if( uiNodeType != CRDT_NODE_NONE )
01223       {
01224             //add the node to the list
01225             AddCreditNode( uiNodeType, uiFlags, zString );
01226       }
01227 
01228       //if any processing of the flags need to be done
01229       HandleCreditFlags( uiFlags );
01230 
01231       return( TRUE );
01232 }
01233 
01234 //return any flags that need to be set in the node
01235 UINT32      GetAndHandleCreditCodeFromCodeString( STR16 pzCode )
01236 {
01237 //new codes:
01238 
01239 
01240       //if the code is to change the delay between strings
01241       if( pzCode[0] == CRDT_DELAY_BN_STRINGS_CODE )
01242       {
01243             UINT32      uiNewDelay=0;
01244 
01245             //Get the delay from the string
01246             swscanf( &pzCode[1], L"%d%*s", &uiNewDelay );
01247 
01248 //          guiCrdtDelayBetweenNodes = uiNewDelay;
01249             guiGapBetweenCreditNodes  = uiNewDelay;
01250 
01251             return( CRDT_NODE_NONE );
01252       }
01253 
01254       //if the code is to change the delay between sections strings
01255       else if( pzCode[0] == CRDT_DELAY_BN_SECTIONS_CODE )
01256       {
01257             UINT32      uiNewDelay=0;
01258 
01259             //Get the delay from the string
01260             swscanf( &pzCode[1], L"%d%*s", &uiNewDelay );
01261 
01262 //          guiCrdtDelayBetweenCreditSection = uiNewDelay;
01263             guiGapBetweenCreditSections = uiNewDelay;
01264 
01265             return( CRDT_NODE_NONE );
01266       }
01267 
01268 
01269       else if( pzCode[0] == CRDT_SCROLL_SPEED )
01270       {
01271             UINT32      uiScrollSpeed=0;
01272 
01273             //Get the delay from the string
01274             swscanf( &pzCode[1], L"%d%*s", &uiScrollSpeed );
01275 
01276             guiCrdtNodeScrollSpeed = uiScrollSpeed;
01277 
01278             return( CRDT_NODE_NONE );
01279       }
01280 
01281       else if( pzCode[0] == CRDT_FONT_JUSTIFICATION )
01282       {
01283             UINT32      uiJustification=0;
01284 
01285             //Get the delay from the string
01286             swscanf( &pzCode[1], L"%d%*s", &uiJustification );
01287 
01288             //get the justification
01289             switch( uiJustification )
01290             {
01291                   case 0:
01292                         gubCrdtJustification = LEFT_JUSTIFIED;
01293                         break;
01294                   case 1:
01295                         gubCrdtJustification = CENTER_JUSTIFIED;
01296                         break;
01297                   case 2:
01298                         gubCrdtJustification = RIGHT_JUSTIFIED;
01299                         break;
01300                   default:
01301                         Assert( 0 );
01302             }
01303 
01304             return( CRDT_NODE_NONE );
01305       }
01306 
01307       else if( pzCode[0] == CRDT_TITLE_FONT_COLOR )
01308       {
01309             //Get the new color for the title
01310             swscanf( &pzCode[1], L"%d%*s", &gubCreditScreenTitleColor );
01311 
01312             return( CRDT_NODE_NONE );
01313       }
01314 
01315       else if( pzCode[0] == CRDT_ACTIVE_FONT_COLOR )
01316       {
01317             //Get the new color for the active text
01318             swscanf( &pzCode[1], L"%d%*s", &gubCreditScreenActiveColor );
01319 
01320             return( CRDT_NODE_NONE );
01321       }
01322 
01323 
01324       //else its the title code
01325       else if( pzCode[0] == CRDT_TITLE )
01326       {
01327             return( CRDT_FLAG__TITLE );
01328       }
01329 
01330       //else its the title code
01331       else if( pzCode[0] == CRDT_START_OF_SECTION )
01332       {
01333             return( CRDT_FLAG__START_SECTION );
01334       }
01335 
01336       //else its the title code
01337       else if( pzCode[0] == CRDT_END_OF_SECTION )
01338       {
01339             return( CRDT_FLAG__END_SECTION );
01340       }
01341 
01342       //else its an error
01343       else
01344       {
01345             Assert( 0 );
01346       }
01347 
01348       return( CRDT_NODE_NONE );
01349 }
01350 
01351 UINT32 CountNumberOfCreditNodes()
01352 {
01353       UINT32      uiNumNodes = 0;
01354       CRDT_NODE   *pTempNode = gCrdtRootNode;
01355 
01356       while( pTempNode )
01357       {
01358             uiNumNodes++;
01359 
01360             pTempNode = pTempNode->pNext;
01361       }
01362 
01363       return( uiNumNodes );
01364 }
01365 
01366 STR16 GetNextCreditCode( STR16 pString, UINT32 *pSizeOfCode )
01367 {
01368       STR16 pzNewCode=NULL;
01369       UINT32 uiSizeOfCode = 0;
01370 
01371       //get the new subcode out
01372       pzNewCode = wcsstr( pString, CRDT_SEPARATION_CODE );
01373 
01374       //if there is no separation code, then there must be an end code
01375       if( pzNewCode == NULL )
01376       {
01377             //pzNewCode = wcsstr( pString, CRDT_END_CODE );
01378 
01379             //we are done
01380             pzNewCode = NULL;
01381       }
01382       else
01383       {
01384             //get rid of separeation code
01385             pzNewCode++;
01386 
01387 
01388             //calc size of sub string
01389             uiSizeOfCode = pzNewCode - pString;
01390       }
01391 
01392       *pSizeOfCode = uiSizeOfCode;
01393       return( pzNewCode );
01394 }
01395

01397 //Flags:
01398 void HandleCreditFlags( UINT32 uiFlags )
01399 {
01400       if( uiFlags & CRDT_FLAG__TITLE )
01401       {
01402       }
01403 
01404       if( uiFlags & CRDT_FLAG__START_SECTION )
01405       {
01406 //          guiCrdtTimeTillReadNextCredit = guiCrdtDelayBetweenNodes;
01407             guiGapTillReadNextCredit = guiGapBetweenCreditNodes;
01408       }
01409 
01410       if( uiFlags & CRDT_FLAG__END_SECTION )
01411       {
01412 //          guiCrdtTimeTillReadNextCredit = guiCrdtDelayBetweenCreditSection;
01413             guiGapTillReadNextCredit = guiGapBetweenCreditSections;
01414       }
01415 }

01432 void SelectCreditFaceMovementRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
01433 { 
01434       if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
01435       {
01436             giCurrentlySelectedFace = -1;
01437       }
01438       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
01439       {
01440             giCurrentlySelectedFace = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion,0 );
01441       }
01442       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_MOVE )
01443       {
01444       }
01445 }
01446 
01447 void InitCreditEyeBlinking()
01448 {
01449       UINT8 ubCnt;
01450 
01451       for( ubCnt=0; ubCnt<NUM_PEOPLE_IN_CREDITS; ubCnt++ )
01452       {
01453             gCreditFaces[ubCnt].uiLastBlinkTime = GetJA2Clock() + Random( gCreditFaces[ubCnt].sBlinkFreq * 2 );
01454       }
01455 }
01456 
01457 void HandleCreditEyeBlinking()
01458 {
01459   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
01460       UINT8 ubCnt;
01461 
01462       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiCreditFaces );
01463 
01464       for( ubCnt=0; ubCnt<NUM_PEOPLE_IN_CREDITS; ubCnt++ )
01465       {
01466             if( ( GetJA2Clock() - gCreditFaces[ubCnt].uiLastBlinkTime ) > (UINT32)gCreditFaces[ubCnt].sBlinkFreq )
01467             {
01468               BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, (UINT8)(ubCnt*3), gCreditFaces[ubCnt].sEyeX, gCreditFaces[ubCnt].sEyeY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL);
01469                   InvalidateRegion( gCreditFaces[ubCnt].sEyeX, gCreditFaces[ubCnt].sEyeY, gCreditFaces[ubCnt].sEyeX + CRDT_EYE_WIDTH, gCreditFaces[ubCnt].sEyeY + CRDT_EYE_HEIGHT );
01470 
01471                   gCreditFaces[ubCnt].uiLastBlinkTime = GetJA2Clock();
01472 
01473                   gCreditFaces[ubCnt].uiEyesClosedTime = GetJA2Clock() + CRDT_EYES_CLOSED_TIME + Random( CRDT_EYES_CLOSED_TIME );
01474             }
01475             else if( GetJA2Clock() > gCreditFaces[ubCnt].uiEyesClosedTime )
01476             {
01477                   gCreditFaces[ubCnt].uiEyesClosedTime = 0;
01478 
01479                   RestoreExternBackgroundRect( gCreditFaces[ubCnt].sEyeX, gCreditFaces[ubCnt].sEyeY, CRDT_EYE_WIDTH, CRDT_EYE_HEIGHT );
01480             }
01481       }
01482 }
